articles.author: Motoring Reporter
articles.title: Revitalised Lexus UX range touches down in Mzansi - TimesLIVE
articles.description: The updated Lexus UX crossover has finally arrived in South Africa. While its edgy looks remain more or less unchanged, the luxury Japanese carmaker has increased the vehicle's structural rigidity by adding an extra 20 spot welds to the body.
